channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Jazz Team Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Jazz Team Server

item.title: CVE-2021-38879|2024-08-04T01:51:20.819Z -- ibm -- jazz%20team%20server
item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTPOnly flag. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the cookie. IBM X-Force ID: 209057.

item.title: CVE-2021-39043|2024-08-04T01:58:17.997Z -- ibm -- jazz%20team%20server
item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 214032.

item.title: CVE-2021-39059|2024-08-04T01:58:18.112Z -- ibm -- jazz%20team%20server
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation (IBM Jazz Team Server 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 214619.

item.title: CVE-2021-38871|2024-08-04T01:51:20.371Z -- ibm -- jazz%20team%20server
item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 208345.
